title: England v South Africa: Women’s Cricket World Cup – live

title: Sarah Mullally is named as first female archbishop of Canterbury
summary: No. 10 has announced a decision regarding a new role that won't be officially assumed until January. The transition will be marked by an enthronement service. The details surrounding the announcement suggest significant implications for government leadership.

title: Manchester synagogue terror attack victim died after accidental police shooting – latest updates
summary: Police reported that the attacker was unarmed during the incident. A second individual sustained non-life-threatening gunshot injuries. The investigation into the situation is ongoing.
